Author: findingelle
Text: oh, also, there is a subtype of osfed that is “low frequency bulimia” that exists if you don’t meet the minimum threshold of b/p episodes per week. osfed is just a serious as other disorders as well. i am NOT a professional, so please seek legit medical advice for a diagnosis. any purging is super dangerous and can cause health complications so it’s not to be taken lightly xx

Author: findingelle
Text: i think, according to the dsm-v, you have to binge followed by some sort of purging at least 1-2 times a week for a minimum of 3 months.   i’m sorry you’re struggling and i hope you are able to get some help and be safe xx
